statements: SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE qualifications LIKE '%Bachelor%';
SELECT id, job_title FROM job_descriptions ORDER BY date_posted DESC;
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01';
SELECT job_title, qualifications FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_title = 'Data Analyst' AND qualifications LIKE '%Python%';
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer' ORDER BY date_posted DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, job_title, qualifications FROM job_descriptions WHERE date_posted > '2021-01-01'
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE qualifications LIKE '%Bachelor%' AND date_posted > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY date_posted ASC
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_title = 'Project Manager' AND qualifications LIKE '%MBA%'
SELECT id, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE date_posted > '2022-01-01' AND job_title = 'Data Analyst' ORDER BY date_posted ASC
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT job_description, job_title FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 2;
SELECT job_id, job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_title LIKE '%Engineer%';
SELECT job_id, job_title FROM job_descriptions ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 1 ORDER BY job_title DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT job_description, job_title FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id > 3 AND job_title LIKE '%Engineer%'
SELECT job_description, qualification_description FROM job_descriptions JOIN qualifications ON job_descriptions.job_id = qualifications.job_id WHERE qualifications.qualification_id < 5
SELECT * FROM qualifications WHERE job_id IN (SELECT job_id FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_description <> '') ORDER BY qualification_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT job_title FROM job_descriptions LEFT JOIN qualifications ON job_descriptions.job_id = qualifications.job_id
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions;
SELECT job_title, preferred_qualifications FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT qualification_description FROM qualifications ORDER BY qualification_id DESC;

SELECT job_title, qualification_description FROM job_descriptions JOIN job_qualifications ON job_descriptions.job_id = job_qualifications.job_id JOIN qualifications ON job_qualifications.qualification_id = qualifications.qualification_id;
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 1;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 2;
SELECT job_title, required_qualifications FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id = 3;

SELECT job_title, qualification_description FROM job_descriptions JOIN job_qualifications ON job_descriptions.job_id = job_qualifications.job_id JOIN qualifications ON job_qualifications.qualification_id = qualifications.qualification_id;

SELECT job_title, qualification_description FROM job_descriptions JOIN job_qualifications ON job_descriptions.job_id = job_qualifications.job_id JOIN qualifications ON job_qualifications.qualification_id = qualifications.qualification_id WHERE job_title LIKE '%Engineer%';
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions
SELECT job_id, job_title, qualifications FROM job_descriptions
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM job_categories
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, job_id FROM job_applicants LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM job_descriptions ORDER BY job_title DESC;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM job_descriptions WHERE job_id > 5;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, job_title FROM job_applicants JOIN job_descriptions ON job_applicants.job_id = job_descriptions.job_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_jobs FROM job_categories JOIN job_descriptions ON job_categories.category_id = job_descriptions.job_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT applicant_id, applicant_name, job_title FROM job_applicants JOIN job_descriptions ON job_applicants.job_id = job_descriptions.job_id WHERE applicant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM JobDescriptions;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM JobDescriptions ORDER BY job_id DESC;
SELECT job_title, minimum_qualification FROM JobDescriptions WHERE job_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Qualifications WHERE qualification_name = 'Bachelor Degree';
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM Applicants WHERE applicant_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM JobDescriptions;
SELECT job_title, job_description FROM JobDescriptions WHERE minimum_qualification = 'Bachelor Degree' ORDER BY job_title ASC;
SELECT job_title, job_description, minimum_qualification FROM JobDescriptions WHERE job_id = 2;
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM JobApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM Applicants WHERE applicant_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY applicant_name DESC;
